overview:
TaobaoFOCUS.com is a website dedicated to shopping on Taobao.com.

We provide you with useful information and everything you need to know to buy from Taobao.com. We are your Taobao agent to buy from China online all kinds of goods at incredibly low price.

Our goal is to make your shopping experience as pleasant as if you were buying on your own.

Taobao.com is a Chinese biggest domestic online shopping marketplace. It has over 80% market share with both C2C and B2C transactions.
